events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, showcasing strong backend development skills.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to the candidate's focus on developer roles and programming experience.
Recruiter Alex was assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process due to their expertise with software engineering profiles.
Conducted an initial screening call focusing on the candidate's experience with distributed systems and cloud infrastructure.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the role and willingness to proceed with technical interviews.
Scheduled the technical interview with the engineering team to assess the candidate's coding and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong knowledge in system design and algorithms.
An HR interview was scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and other organizational policies.
The HR interview went positively, with the candidate showing alignment with company values and expectations.
An offer was proposed reflecting the candidate's experience level and market standards in the engineering field.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed eagerness to join the team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed the start date with the recruiting team.
The onboarding process was initiated, including account setup, introduction to the team, and access to development tools.
The recruitment case was successfully closed after the candidate completed their onboarding and began contributing to projects.
